original_text: Nobody gave him anything to eat. He even wanted to eat the food that the pigs were eating. But he had nothing.
korean_text: 그가 돼지 먹는 쥐엄 열매로 배를 채우고자 하되 주는 자가 없는지라

sentences.original_text: Nobody gave him anything to eat.
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그에게 먹을 것을 주지 않았다.

sentences.original_text: He even wanted to eat the food
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 심지어 그 음식을 먹고 싶어했다
